title: PowerRatankba
extract: PowerRatankba is a powerShell-based malware variant of "Ratankba", which results with a deployment of a multifunctional backdoor allowing its operators to steal cryptocurrency wallet credentials. PowerRatankba is attributed to the the "Lazarus Group", a North-Korean state-sponsored threat group.
extract_html: PowerRatankba is a powerShell-based malware variant of "Ratankba", which results with a deployment of a multifunctional backdoor allowing its operators to steal cryptocurrency wallet credentials. PowerRatankba is attributed to the the "Lazarus Group", a North-Korean state-sponsored threat group.
